```{r test_results, echo=FALSE}

acts<- rnorm(1000, 4, 2)
pred <- acts + rnorm(1000, 0, 1)
tibble(predictions = pred, actuals = acts) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = actuals, y = predictions)) +
  geom_point() + 
  xlab("Actuals") +
  ylab("Predictions") +
  ggtitle("Actuals vs. Predictions")

```
